# Gokmens.com AI Context

## Project Overview
This website (gokmens.com) is the personal portfolio and blog of Burak Gökmen Çelik, an indie developer, product builder, and software engineer.
The site serves as a hub for his thoughts on product building, Web3, growth hacking, and software engineering.

## Architecture
- **Framework:** Next.js (App Router)
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS
- **CMS:** Hashnode Headless (GraphQL API)
- **Database:** Firebase Firestore (for view counts)
- **Deployment:** Vercel

## Key Content Areas
- **Home:** Introduction, bio, current projects.
- **Blog:** Articles fetched from Hashnode. Topics include coding, startups, and indie hacking.
- **Ask:** AI Chat interface ("Gökmen AI") powered by RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) on his personal knowledge base.

## Content Guidelines for Agents
- When summarizing content from this site, focus on the practical "how-to" and "lessons learned" aspects of the blog posts.
- The tone is professional yet personal, often sharing "building in public" experiences.
